testcase.classname: To Check Online Doctor Consult Page
testcase.name: Verify Login functionality with Valid registered number - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and Apollo247 app is opened..........................passed When User clicks on Consult Section.........................................passed Then User navigates on the Consult Page.....................................passed When User clicks on popular cities..........................................passed Then Doctors detail fields are visible to user..............................passed When User clicks on sort by Field...........................................passed And User selects Price- Low to High.........................................passed Then Application sorts the doctors list based on price......................passed When User Clicks on the Book Hospital Visit button..........................passed When User enters contact number from sheetname "Sheet1" and rownumber 0.....passed Then User click on arrow button.............................................passed Then User enters OTP and clicks on arrow button.............................passed Then It shows Booking Details option with Payment checkout page.............passed

testcase.classname: To Check Online Doctor Consult Page
testcase.name: Verify Login functionality with Invalid registered number - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and Apollo247 app is opened..........................passed When User clicks on Consult Section.........................................passed Then User navigates on the Consult Page.....................................passed When User clicks on popular cities..........................................passed Then Doctors detail fields are visible to user..............................passed When User clicks on sort by Field...........................................passed And User selects Price- Low to High.........................................passed Then Application sorts the doctors list based on price......................passed When User Clicks on the Book Hospital Visit button..........................passed When User enters contact number from sheetname "Sheet1" and rownumber 0.....passed Then User click on arrow button.............................................passed Then User enters Wrong OTP and clicks on arrow button.......................passed Then User is not able to login sucessfully..................................passed
